class.name: ${classDoc.name()}
class.constructors:
<% for (constructor in classDoc.constructors()) { %>
<% for (parameter in constructor.parameters()) { %> <% } %>
${constructor.commentText()}
<% } %>
class.methods:
<% for (method in classDoc.methods()) { %>
<% for (parameter in method.parameters()) { %> <% } %>
${method.commentText()}
<% } %>
